channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
karmascape non pk
i tried to add dragon smithing to make it funner... when i used gold bar with anvil, nuttin happened so i tried some stuff ended up gold bars make rune stuff can som1 plz fix this so u make drag stuff insteada rune stuff? [code]//Rune if(removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730) if(removeID == 1149 || removeID == 7158 || removeID == 3140 || removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730) { return 2357; } //Dragon if(removeID == 1149 || removeID == 7158 || removeID == 3140) || removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432 || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333 || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185 || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113 || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093 || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824 || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 44 || removeID == 868) { return 2365; }[/code]here's what i get
[IMG]http://i6.tinypic.com/5yb757q.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

you missed some of these ; and added a } were it is not needed so use this

//Rune if(removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730) if(removeID == 1149 || removeID == 7158 || removeID == 3140 || removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730) { return 2357; } //Dragon if(removeID == 1149 || removeID == 7158 || removeID == 3140)( || removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432 || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333 || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185 || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113 || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093 || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824 || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 0044 || removeID == 868); { return 2365; }
somthing like that should work if not this is what your compiler is saying

on line 5681 you need to add a ) or a } one of those, now on linke 5687 you need to add a ; after 868)

that should fix your errors

Read full topic
